post_info.post_title: Who's interpretation of Christanity is right?

Christianity seems to be in the mind of the believer and what suits their own agenda. There doesn't appear to be any objective criteria by which one can judge any particular version of Christianity: all information on which to base a belief is in the bible and therefore subject to endless interpretation.

I believe there is a correct interpretation of Christianity, I equally firmly believe that none of us knows for sure what it is. We can say certain things with greater or lesser degrees of certainty, but the idea that with the evidence currently available there is a uniquely true version of Christianity around at the moment is a dubious one.

He who is mightiest is sure to ensure his interpretation is the rightiest.
